blogEntry.title: Summer of Code 2012
blogEntry.body:
LispNYC is petitioning to be a mentoring organization for Google's Summer of Code 2012.

We're available at #summeroflisp at irc.freenode.net (9-5 EST) if you'd like to discuss anything in realtime.

Project ideas are being fleshed out at reddit.lispnyc.org. Anyone can submit, vote and comment on the Scheme, Clojure and Common Lisp projects you feel are great!
blogEntry.author: heow
